title: It’s getting serious
author: VD
content_html:
The Georgian Foreign Ministry reported that Russian aircrafts have completely destroyed the harbor of Poti, in the immediate vicinity of Supsa, a vital oil terminal.

It’s interesting to consider these developments in light of both Pat Buchanan’s recent WND column and VDH’s A War Like No Other. Both of these stand in harsh contrast to the Fukuyama/Neocon position that seeding democracy is likely to be a successful means of expanding foreign influence in the long term.
